property.name: ipName
property.label: Integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this list.

property.name: inputJSON
property.label: Input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure.

property.name: optionsJSON
property.label: Options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure.

property.name: dateStyle
property.label: Date style
property.description: Styling to be applie to the date.

property.name: showLink
property.label: Show link
property.description: Indicates that the link information should be displayed.

property.name: isBlock
property.label: Is block
property.description: The link applies to the whole list item vs. only the headline.

property.name: isReversed
property.label: Is reversed
property.description: The image, if any, should be displayed on the left hand side.

property.name: isRelative
property.label: Is relative to Community base
property.description: The link URL is relative to the community base URL.

property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
